item.title: Mastering Bulk RNA-seq Analysis â€“ Post 1: Introduction
item.description: Discover the complete roadmap for mastering bulk RNA-seq analysis in R. This series introduction outlines a 10-post journey from foundational concepts to advanced applications, building on genomic data structures to solve real biological questions through differential expression analysis.
